name: ToeJam & Earl: Back in the Groove!
description: ToeJam & Earl: Back in the Groove! is a mash-up of the very best features of the classic console games with a ton of funky fresh improvements!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad CPU Q6600 @ 2.40GHz (4 CPUs) / AMD Phenom 9850 Quad-Core Processor (4 CPUs) @ 2.5GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9800 GT 1GB / AMD Radeon HD 4870 1GB DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Yes
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
